title: All the Unreleased Tech We’ve Found at the 2024 Tour de France (So Far)
content:
A new Van Rysel aero road bike, new saddles from Specialized and Cadex, a new Poc helmet, and more found at the Tour de France 2024.

Read the full article at All the Unreleased Tech We’ve Found at the 2024 Tour de France (So Far) on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
